subject: Contributed article: Nearly 10 years of real copy trading on eToro
body:
Hi Finance Magnates team,

I'm Tom from Social Trading Vlog. I've been copy trading on eToro since 2016 — nearly 10 years — and have documented the entire journey across 335 YouTube videos and my website socialtradingvlog.com.

I'd like to contribute an article:

"The Evolution of Social Trading: One User's Nearly 10-Year Journey on eToro"

This would cover:

- How eToro's copy trading features have changed since 2016
- The real impact of the Popular Investor programme on trader behaviour
- What retail copiers actually experience vs what the marketing promises
- Lessons from copying traders through COVID, the 2022 bear market, and the 2024-25 bull run

I'm not a financial adviser — just a real user with nearly a decade of documented experience. I think your readers would find an honest, long-term perspective valuable.

Happy to send a draft or outline.

Best,
Tom
Social Trading Vlog
https://socialtradingvlog.com
https://youtube.com/@SocialTradingVlog
